page.title: 07Our House,Near Rugby
page.content: Our house is semi-detached and it has 12 rooms:-lounge,dining-room, kitchen,4 bedrooms,toilet,bathroom, shower-room,landing and loft. Our bedroom is downstairs.It has recently been redecorated with pink and white clouds.We have twin beds with duvets.We have a record-player and a tape-recorder.We have lots of pop posters of Howard Jones and Duran Duran above our cupboards our wardrobe is fitted in one corner. There are sets of shelves above the beds.We have double glazing on our windows and venetian blinds with a teddy bear in front.We have lots of cuddly toys around the room and we have a hamster called sammy and goldfish called Albie 2 and Audrey.
